editorType.name: editorType
editorType.description:
The editors which the plugin is available for:

  • word - text document editor,
  • cell - spreadsheet editor,
  • slide - presentation editor,
  • pdf - pdf editor.

initDataType.name: initDataType
initDataType.description:
The data type selected in the editor and sent to the plugin:

  • text - the text data,
  • html - HTML formatted code,
  • ole - OLE object data,
  • desktop - the desktop editor data,
  • destop-external - the main page data of the desktop app (system messages),
  • none - no data will be send to the plugin from the editor,
  • sign - the sign for the keychain plugin.

Button.name: Button
Button.description: The skinnable plugin button used in the plugin interface (used for visual plugins with their own window only, i.e. isVisual == true and isInsideMode == false).

properties.name: text
properties.description: The label which is displayed on the button.

properties.name: primary
properties.description: Defines if the button is primary or not. The primary flag affects the button skin only.

properties.name: isViewer
properties.description: Defines if the button is shown in the viewer mode only or not.

properties.name: textLocale
properties.description: Translations for the text field. The object keys are the two letter language codes (ru, de, it, etc.) and the values are the button label translation for each language.

properties.name: m_wsFontName
properties.description: The font name.

properties.name: m_wsFontPath
properties.description: The path to the file with the current font.

properties.name: m_lIndex
properties.description: The font number in the file if there is more than one font in the file.

properties.name: m_bBold
properties.description: Specifies if the font characters are bold or not.

properties.name: m_bItalic
properties.description: Specifies if the font characters are italic or not.

properties.name: m_bIsFixed
properties.description: Specifies if the current font is monospaced or not.

properties.name: m_aPanose
properties.description: The PANOSE Typeface Classification Number, a compact 10-byte description of the font critical visual characteristics, such as contrast, weight, and serif style.

properties.name: m_ulUnicodeRange1
properties.description: The Unicode range encompassed by the font file (Bits 0-31).

properties.name: m_ulUnicodeRange2
properties.description: The Unicode range encompassed by the font file (Bits 32-63).

properties.name: m_ulUnicodeRange3
properties.description: The Unicode range encompassed by the font file (Bits 64-95).

properties.name: m_ulUnicodeRange4
properties.description: The Unicode range encompassed by the font file (Bits 96-127).

properties.name: m_ulCodePageRange1
properties.description: The code pages encompassed by the font file (Bits 0-31).

properties.name: m_ulCodePageRange2
properties.description: The code pages encompassed by the font file (Bits 32-63).

properties.name: m_usWeigth
properties.description: The visual weight (stroke blackness or thickness) of the font characters (1-1000).

properties.name: m_usWidth
properties.description: The relative change from the normal aspect ratio (width to height ratio).

properties.name: m_sFamilyClass
properties.description: The font family class which values are assigned by IBM to each font family.

properties.name: m_eFontFormat
properties.description: The specific file type(s) used to store font data: 0 - *.fon, 1 - *.ttf, 2 - *.ttf, *.otf (CFF), 3 - unknown font format.

properties.name: m_shAvgCharWidth
properties.description: The arithmetic average of the escapement (width) of all non-zero width glyphs in the font.

properties.name: m_shAscent
properties.description: The height above the baseline for a clipping region.

properties.name: m_shDescent
properties.description: The vertical extent below the baseline for a clipping region.

properties.name: m_shLineGap
properties.description: The typographic line gap for the current font.

properties.name: m_shXHeight
properties.description: The distance between the baseline and the approximate height of non-ascending lowercase letters measured in FUnits.

properties.name: m_shCapHeight
properties.description: The distance between the baseline and the approximate height of uppercase letters measured in FUnits.

Macros.name: Macros
Macros.description: An object containing the data about all the macros from the document.

properties.name: macrosArray
properties.description: An array of macros codes ([{"name": "Macros1", "value": "{macrosCode}"}]).

properties.name: current
properties.description: A current macro index.

properties.name: transparent
properties.description: The watermark transparency degree.

properties.name: type
properties.description: The {@link /docbuilder/global#ShapeType shape type} which specifies the preset shape geometry for the current watermark.

properties.name: width
properties.description: The watermark width measured in millimeters.

properties.name: height
properties.description: The watermark height measured in millimeters.

properties.name: rotate
properties.description: The watermark rotation angle measured in degrees.

properties.name: margins
properties.description: The text margins measured in millimeters in the watermark shape.

properties.name: fill
properties.description: The watermark fill color in the RGB format, or the URL to image (base64 support: data:image/png;...). The empty array [] means that the watermark has no fill.

properties.name: stroke-width
properties.description: The watermark stroke width measured in millimeters.

properties.name: stroke
properties.description: The watermark stroke color in the RGB format. The empty array [] means that the watermark stroke has no fill.

properties.name: align
properties.description: The vertical text align in the watermark shape: 0 - bottom, 1 - center, 4 - top.

properties.name: paragraphs
properties.description: The array with paragraphs from the current watermark with their properties.

properties.name: paragraphs.align
properties.description: The horizontal text align in the current paragraph: 0 - right, 1 - left, 2 - center, 3 - justify.

properties.name: paragraphs.fill
properties.description: The paragraph highlight in the RGB format. The empty array [] means that the paragraph is not highlighted.

properties.name: paragraphs.linespacing
properties.description: The text linespacing in the current paragraph.

properties.name: paragraphs.runs
properties.description: The array with runs from the current paragraph with their properties.

properties.name: paragraphs.runs.text
properties.description: The run text.

properties.name: paragraphs.runs.fill
properties.description: The text highlight in the RGB format. The empty array [] means that the text is not highlighted.

properties.name: paragraphs.runs.font-family
properties.description: The text font family.

properties.name: paragraphs.runs.font-size
properties.description: The text font size measured in points (pt).

properties.name: paragraphs.runs.bold
properties.description: Defines if the current text is displayed bold or not.

properties.name: paragraphs.runs.italic
properties.description: Defines if the current text is displayed italic or not.

properties.name: paragraphs.runs.strikeout
properties.description: Defines if the current text is displayed struck through or not.

properties.name: paragraphs.runs.underline
properties.description: Defines if the current text is displayed underlined or not.

properties.name: tags
properties.description: The form tags which specify the content for each form type with such a tag.

properties.name: tags.text
properties.description: The text field value (some text).

properties.name: tags.checkBox
properties.description: The checkbox form value (true - checked, false - unchecked).

properties.name: tags.picture
properties.description: The image form value (a link to the image).

properties.name: tags.comboBox
properties.description: The combo box form value (one of the items from the combo box list values).

ReplaceImageMode.name: ReplaceImageMode
ReplaceImageMode.description: Specifies how to adjust the image object in case of replacing the selected image.

ImageData.name: ImageData
ImageData.description: An object containing the information about the base64 encoded png image.

properties.name: src
properties.description: The image source in the base64 format.

properties.name: width
properties.description: The image width in pixels.

properties.name: height
properties.description: The image height in pixels.

properties.name: replaceMode
properties.description: Specifies how to adjust the image object in case of replacing the selected image.

properties.name: url
properties.description: The URL to plugin config.

properties.name: guid
properties.description: The plugin identifier. It must be of the asc.{UUID} type.

properties.name: canRemoved
properties.description: Specifies if the plugin can be removed (true) or not (false).

properties.name: obj
properties.description: The {@link /plugin/config config} of the installed plugin. The version is taken from the config and compared with the current one to check for updates.

properties.name: id
properties.description: The item ID.

properties.name: text
properties.description: The item text.

properties.name: disabled
properties.description: Specifies if the current item is disabled or not.

properties.name: items
properties.description: An array containing the context menu items for the current item.
